overview: Darla and Sean are struggling to stay together after Sean's infidelity. Magdalene and her young lesbian lover Chastity are fighting over Chastity's desire for sex with men. Angry Deluxe suspects husband Alex of a "bromance" with Wolf Hudson. Can "Relationship Guru" Nick Manning help them with his Couple's Workshop? Or will their desire for hot sex ruin what's left of their relationships? A funny, surprisingly intense look at love and hot sex with a charmingly diverse cast.
tagline: Cheating that doesn't kill your relationship, only makes it hotter.
title: Cheaters Retreat
